name: Mellow Garden
description:
a less-realistic gardening simulation

take care of your own tree and make sure it doesn't die!
compete with your friends by comparing your times and using the Google Play leaderboards (when it releases!)

You can periodically check in on this page for more updates!

Make sure to read the FAQ and this blog post for more info!
Also make sure to say Hi and to check out other posts on the forum!
